    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });

      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>
  </head>

      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });

      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });

      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });

      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

          <i class="icon-remove delete_action pull-right"></i>
         </fieldset>
       </div>
   </div>
</div>


    </div>

      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

  jQuery(document).ready(function() {
    jQuery('#add_attachment').click(function() {
      var html = '<div class="attachment"><input class="file add_attachment" id="tmp_files_" name="tmp_files[]" size="15" type="file"></div>'
      jQuery('#upload_container').append(html);
    })
  })

    <script type="text/javascript">
      // Ugly, yes, but gets the job done.
      jQuery(document).ajaxError(function(event, request, settings){
        // Only do redirect on authentication error
        if (request.status == '401') {
          var url = 'http://localhost:3000/auth/users/sign_in';
          document.location.href = url;
        }
      });
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  jQuery(document).ready(function() {
    jQuery('#add_attachment').click(function() {
      var html = '<div class="attachment"><input class="file add_attachment" id="tmp_files_" name="tmp_files[]" size="15" type="file"></div>'
      jQuery('#upload_container').append(html);
    })
  })
</script>
